pr_title: Add a releaseProfile to generate dependency reduced pom

timeline.message: add a releaseProfile to generate dependency reduced pom

timeline.bodyText:
shall we add it here too @Xenorith  -Prelease-profile

  
    
      alluxio/dev/scripts/src/alluxio.org/build-distribution/cmd/generate-tarball.go
    
    
         Line 99
      in
      384f944
    
    
    
    

        
          
           args := []string{"-T", "2C", "-am", "clean", "install", "-DskipTests", "-Dfindbugs.skip", "-Dmaven.javadoc.skip", "-Dcheckstyle.skip", "-Pno-webui-linter"}
timeline.author: apc999

replies.bodyText: from my understanding but correct me if i'm wrong, -Prelease-profile is only necessary when building artifacts to be published to maven. in all other cases, we would not want this profile to be enabled
replies.author: Xenorith

replies.bodyText: @LuQQiu can you confirm that we do not want to append this profile argument to generate-tarball.go because this doesn't get executed when publishing to maven?
replies.author: Xenorith

replies.bodyText: Not quite sure if we need it when generating the tarball. But publish to maven doesn't have relationships with generate-tarball.go
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: @LuQQiu Thanks for your reply, as publish to maven doesn't have relationships with generate-tarball.go, so I think we don't need to add -Prelease here.
replies.author: maobaolong

timeline.message: Rename the release-profile profile name to release
